description_id: Perakitan dan instalasi panel Low Voltage Main Distribution Panel (LVMDP) kapasitas 3000A lengkap dengan sistem sinkronisasi interlock Genset-PLN.
description_en: Assembly and installation of 3000A capacity Low Voltage Main Distribution Panel (LVMDP) complete with Genset-PLN interlock synchronization system.

description_id: Pemasangan unit panel Kapasitor Bank step otomatis untuk memperbaiki Power Factor (cos phi) pabrik guna menghindari denda kVARh PLN.
description_en: Installation of an automatic step Capacitor Bank panel unit to improve factory Power Factor (cos phi) to avoid PLN kVARh penalties.

description_id: Purifikasi oli trafo, pengetesan tahanan isolasi, dan pemeliharaan kubikel 20kV secara komprehensif tanpa downtime sistem yang berkepanjangan.
description_en: Transformer oil purification, insulation resistance testing, and comprehensive 20kV cubicle maintenance without prolonged system downtime.

title_id: Instalasi Cable Tray & Penarikan Kabel Mv
title_en: Cable Tray Installation & MV Cable Pulling
description_id: Fabrikasi rak kabel tray industri gantung sepanjang 2km beserta penarikan kabel power Medium Voltage NYFGBY 3x150mm².
description_en: Fabrication of 2km hanging industrial cable tray racks along with pulling Medium Voltage NYFGBY 3x150mm² power cables.

description_id: Pembaruan sistem kontrol sinkronisasi otomatis untuk 3 unit genset 1000kVA demi memastikan keandalan pasokan listrik rumah sakit 24/7.
description_en: Upgrade of automatic synchronization control system for 3 units of 1000kVA gensets to ensure 24/7 hospital power supply reliability.

description_id: Audit profil beban listrik pabrik menyeluruh menggunakan power quality analyzer untuk merekomendasikan langkah efisiensi energi yang terukur.
description_en: Comprehensive factory electrical load profile audit using power quality analyzers to recommend measurable energy efficiency steps.

description_id: Pekerjaan retrofit dan penggantian Air Circuit Breaker (ACB) lama dengan unit baru berkapasitas 4000A tanpa overhaul seluruh panel.
description_en: Retrofit and replacement work of old Air Circuit Breaker (ACB) with a new 4000A capacity unit without overhauling the entire panel.
